text: The first presidential debate is high stakes. Can Trump avoid the sitting-president first-debate slump? Does Biden come across competently? And how personal will it get?

Moderator Chris Wallace generally struggled to maintain order as President Trump and Democratic nominee Joe Biden quickly sparred with each other. Trump often interrupted Biden â€” and Wallace â€” while ignoring the rules, and Biden called Trump "the worst president America's ever had."
